typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100) ~> SalesSouthridgeCustomer
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> SalesSouthridgeAdresses
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> StreamingSouthridgeCustomer
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> StreamingSouthridgeAdresses
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> FourthCoffeeCustomer
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> VanArselCustomer
SalesSouthridgeCustomer, SalesSouthridgeAdresses join(SalesSouthridgeCustomer@CustomerID == SalesSouthridgeAdresses@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> SalesCustomerAdressJoin
StreamingSouthridgeCustomer, StreamingSouthridgeAdresses join(StreamingSouthridgeCustomer@CustomerID == StreamingSouthridgeAdresses@CustomerID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> StreamingCustomerAdressesJoin
FourthCoffeeCustomer union(byName: true)~> Union1
SalesCustomerAdressJoin select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SalesSouthridgeCustomer@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate = SalesSouthridgeCustomer@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = SalesSouthridgeCustomer@UpdatedDate,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesColumn
StreamingCustomerAdressesJoin select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = StreamingSouthridgeCustomer@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		CreatedDate = StreamingSouthridgeCustomer@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = StreamingSouthridgeCustomer@UpdatedDate,
		AddressID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectStreamingColumn
SelectSalesColumn, SelectStreamingColumn union(byName: true)~> Union
